text: Strega Nona has insane specials where they just give away food and wine for nothing- It seriously makes me think it might be a front for some other operation. Update: Seems like this place has changed its name (maybe owners too?). I haven't been back recently so I don't know if it is any good.
Cozy place...great crowd and a great spot to go after basball games!

This is a great casual Italian restaurant on Southport. The food is always great. They have some great specials. Monday is $5.00 pasta, Tues penny wine bottles, Wed martini night and Thursdays it is BYOB with no corkage. The roasted chicken is the best in the city.

This is a very cute and cozy Italian place in Wrigley. The entree's are a ltitle big but delicious! During the week they have great specials-my favorite being the penny bottles of wine on Tuesdays with a purchase of an entree!!

This neighborhood Italian joint is a cute little eatery near my house that never disapoints--and really works for everyone. I've taken my parents here for a quiet dinner and also enjoyed it with girlfriends and lots of wine. The food here is delicious (I'm a fool for the Farfalle Fontina) and with $5 pasta on Mondays you really can't go wrong. The service here is always awesome as well - I mean, how can you not love the waiter who shimmies your Cosmos over to the table? I would definitely recommend this to anyone who likes their pasta fattening and delicious, their martinis strong, and their stomachs full.

I love their different Â "special" nights. Some friends and I went for $2 martinis and our server was so nice and friendly. I still have yet to check out their astrology night on Tuesdays where you can get your palm reading and pasta dishes for $5.

The Mercury and Music Box Theatres are right on the same block, as are a few clubs and stores. Excellent service in this slightly upscale Italian eatery. The food was fair, the atmosphere inside was fantastic. Maybe the chef was having a bit of an off night.
